document.full_text: striking truck drivers protested for a third day on friday in shanghai's main harbor district amid heavy police presence and signs the action has already started to curb exports from the world's busiest container port.
document.title: third day of shanghai strike threatens china exports
lines_and_colors: striking truck drivers protested for a third day on friday in shanghai's main harbor district amid heavy police presence and signs the action has already started to curb exports from the world's busiest container port.
